stages.title: Application
stages.text: You leave a request and our manager will contact you to discuss the details of the project.

stages.title: Documentary part
stages.text: We make a drawing of the future building, discuss a detailed estimate and prepare a commercial proposal.

stages.title: Manufacturing
stages.text: After all the conditions of cooperation are approved and the prepayment is made, we start production of the building.

stages.title: Delivery
stages.text: We deliver the order for the location, install and connect all communications. The building is ready for use.

advantages.title: Speed
advantages.text: Extremely fast production and deployment is possible due to innovative technology, careful selection of materials, 3 years of R&D, extensive testing. The way fully ready modules are constructed ensures straightforward and easy process of installation.

advantages.title: Mobility
advantages.text: Our houses are mobile. It means that you may move the house from one place to another. The house of any size may be moved fast, easy and cheap with the help of trucks to another location preserving all the functionality and finishing.

advantages.title: Quality of factory production
advantages.text: The quality of assembling of the house with all facilities and finishing that factory productions provides just cannot be achieved while constructing the house on the plot on open air. That leads to extensive durability of the house, low cost of maintenance, energy efficiency.

advantages.title: Expandability
advantages.text: Modular structure allows to expand the house when needed by adding additional modules of any functionality and required size. Old modules might be replaced with new ones of a different functionality and size. The second and the third floors might be added as needed.

products.title: EXCLUSIVE HOUSES
products.text: Our architecture bureau may develop the project that suits your exclusive needs and taste. If you have a plot that requires additional creative approach, we would be happy to develop the best solution for you.

products.title:
GUEST / RECREATIONAL 
/ INDIVIDUAL HOUSES
products.text: Such houses might be installed on the plot aside of main house, as well as serve as place of living for one-two persons. We recommend using screw pile foundations, because it is fast and easy, and it does not harm the plot and plants on it, is environment friendly.

products.title: FAMILY HOUSES
products.text: Our architecture bureau may develop the project that suits your exclusive needs and taste. If you have a plot that requires additional creative approach, we would be happy to develop the best solution for you.
